listitem.para: Whether or not to send IKEv2 REDIRECT notify payloads (RFC 5685) in IKE_SA_INIT reply. Typical use case for this is clients-server use case, where the server is the one redirecting clients to other gateway. Accepted values are on (always send), off (never send) and auto (the default), where auto currently means send payload if DDoS defence mechanism is active.
